categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Rhee was a female individual who was affiliated with the Rebel Alliance. She was the wife of Eron, and the aunt of Laina. In 2 BBY, she and Eron helped get Laina and her father Ryland to safety after the death of his wife Fiona, who had been killed when the couple were framed for being rebel spies. In 0 BBY, Rhee and Eron took in Laina when Ryland gave her into their care, believing that the Alliance's base on Yavin 4 was not a safe place for his daughter. Rhee and Eron intended to take Laina to Alderaan.
